= Wiki for me =

== Key Configurations And Commands ==
  === default ===
  
  === fzf ===
    * *<C-f>f (PATH)*: search *files* at PATH
    * *<C-f>c*: search *commands*
    * *<C-f>l PATTERN*: search *all of the files that matching the PATTERN*
  
  === coc-nvim ===
    * *[d*: navigate previous *diagnostics* 
    * *d]*: navigate next *diagnostics* 

    === gotos ===
      * *<C-l>d*:*definition*
      * *<C-l>r*:*references*

    * *<C-k>*: documentation (show types in .hs files)

    * *<C-l>ca*: do *code action* of current line
    * *<C-l>a*: do *code action* of selected region

    * *<C-l>f*: *fix* a problem of current line
    * *<C-l><C-f>*: *format* current buffe
    * *<C-l>i*:*organize import* of current buffe

    * *:Fold*:*fold* current buffe
  
  === Hoogle ===
    * *<C-l>w*: search in *Hoogle*
    * *:H WORD*:search WORD in *Hoogle*
